questions.question: Considering the overall form factor, what is the primary shape of this travel suitcase?
What appears to be the predominant color of the hard shell exterior of this suitcase?
Based on the visual texture, what material seems to be used for the suitcase's outer casing?
Judging by its design and features, what is this item's intended function as a piece of luggage?
Describe the surface texture of the suitcase's hard shell, is it smooth, ribbed, or otherwise?
What type of wheels, considering their apparent size and construction, are present on the suitcase?
Considering the closing mechanism, how many compartments or sections does this suitcase appear to have?
What is the color of the zipper that seems to divide the two compartments of the suitcase?
What seems to be the material of the handles and the zipper pullers of this suitcase?
Describe the shape of the small, slightly recessed handles on either side of the suitcase?
What type of closure is predominantly used to secure the two halves of this travel bag?
Observing the base, how many wheels support this rolling suitcase?
What is the apparent finish of the blue color on the suitcase's exterior; is it matte, glossy, or something else?
Besides the main wheels, are there any additional visible supporting elements at the base of this suitcase?
Looking at the suitcase's top, what kind of handle is visible for carrying the suitcase?
